channel.title: A new approach to the future of runescape private server's?
channel.description:
hello, MoparScape community
Why we should NOT make Runescape private server's like RuneScape...
firstly, if you wanted to play a server that is almost as good as the real thing, that would be a bit weird... because you could just play the real thing...
The people who code RSPS's should not make them with all the RuneScape Mini-games and Weapons. Why? read the paragraph above... You should create custom weapons and armour's, that mite seen a bit hard but that would make something you could call your own... instead of saying you made this RSPS, because Jagex made that and your just copying them.
So please coder's make something different...

item.title: A new approach to the future of runescape private server's?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

The reason people make it as close as possible to Runescape as that so many people prefer ‘old school’ pking, money making etc. It’s one of the reasons private servers are so popular.

Read full topic
